welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yorkshire, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our welcoming community. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is dedicated to international flights and houses a variety of duty-free shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as a hub for United Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, but may experience slower speeds during peak travel times.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport houses all ticketing, baggage claim, and ground transportation services.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves a variety of airlines, including Delta, United, and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport provides check-in, baggage claim, and boarding services for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport, with a network name of 'Potomac Airport WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
